data_element_text: Are you of Hispanic or Latino origin? May include Spanish origin.
What is your biological sex assigned at birth?
What is the highest level of education you have achieved outside or in the United States?
How many years of education have you completed?
What kind of health insurance do you have?
Do you have a disability, including serious physical or mental conditions, that interfere with your ability to carry out daily activities?
Are you deaf or do you have serious difficulty hearing?
Are you blind or do you have serious difficulty seeing, even when wearing glasses?
Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions?
Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs?
Do you have difficulty dressing or bathing?
Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a doctor's office or shopping?
Vaping Frequency: Do you now use electronic cigarettes every day, some days, rarely, or not at all?
Nicotine Frequency: Do you now smoke cigarettes?
Do you use any tobacco/nicotine products (including cigarettes, cigars, e-cigarettes, etc)?
In your entire life, have you had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol, not counting small tastes or sips? (Yes or No)
How often did you have a drink containing alcohol in the past year?
How often did you have a drink containing alcohol ?
Cancer (including leukemia or lymphoma) undergoing active treatment?
Cancer diagnosis and/or treatment within the past 12 months
Coronary artery disease (blockages in your heart vessels) or angina (chest pain)?
Stroke or TIA (Transient Ischemic Attack or Mini-Stroke)?
Anemia or other blood disorder (do not include leukemia or lymphoma)?
History of premature birth (being born before 37 weeks of pregnancy)
Chronic Lung Disease Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia (CLD BPD)
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) including emphysema, chronic bronchitis, obstructive pulmonary disease?
Serious heart condition (heart failure, CAD, cardiomyopathies)
Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
New loss of taste or smell
Sore throat, congestion or runny nose
Tingling or numbness or swelling of hands and feet
Red or purple rash or lesions on toes
Change in or loss of appetite
Would you say that (your) health in general is excellent, very good, good, fair, or poor?
What is your height in inches?
What is your weight in pounds?
